content.query:
USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_date') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_date;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_date(    
	[DateKey] [int],
	[FullDateAlternateKey] [date],
	[DayNumberOfWeek] [tinyint] ,
	[EnglishDayNameOfWeek] [nvarchar](10),
	[SpanishDayNameOfWeek] [nvarchar](10),
	[FrenchDayNameOfWeek] [nvarchar](10),     
	[DayNumberOfMonth] [tinyint],
	[DayNumberOfYear] [smallint],
	[WeekNumberOfYear] [tinyint],
	[EnglishMonthName] [nvarchar](10),
	[SpanishMonthName] [nvarchar](10),
	[FrenchMonthName] [nvarchar](10),
	[MonthNumberOfYear] [tinyint],
	[CalendarQuarter] [tinyint],
	[CalendarYear] [smallint],
	[CalendarSemester] [tinyint],
	[FiscalQuarter] [tinyint],
	[FiscalYear] [smallint],
	[FiscalSemester] [tinyint])
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimDate.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = psv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_date'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_date;
